rules_text:
Whenever you cast a spell, create X Aether token, where X is the number of spells you cast this turn. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Crew 3 [i](Tap creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
